import React from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Button, Card } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FaUser, FaSignInAlt, FaInfoCircle, FaQuestionCircle, FaEnvelope } from 'react-icons/fa'; const LandingPage = () => { return (

Welcome to CrickBidders

Your ultimate platform for cricket auctions!

 {/* About Section: 3 Cards Horizontally */}

About Us

 CrickBidders is a premier platform dedicated to cricket enthusiasts and organizers who want to engage in online auctions for cricket tournaments. Our mission is to make cricket auctions accessible and enjoyable for teams, players, and fans alike.

Why Choose Us?

 We provide a seamless, secure, and fun way for teams to bid on players, manage auctions, and ensure the integrity of cricket tournaments with complete transparency.

Our Vision

 Our vision is to revolutionize how cricket auctions are conducted, making them more interactive and accessible to cricket lovers around the globe. {/* How to Use Section: 3 Cards Horizontally */}

How to Use
  • Register as a committee leader, team head, or player.

Set Up Auction
  • Set up an auction or join an existing team.

Bid and Build
  • Bid on players, track points, and build your team!
 {/* Contact Us Section */}

Contact Us

 If you have any questions or need support, feel free to reach out.
); }; export default LandingPage;
